website_summaries.verdict: This is a good option if you're looking for a small, portable vacuum that can tackle all types of floors.
pros: Lay-flat handle makes it easy to get under furniture
Multi-surface brush roll moves easily from carpet to hard floor and back
cons: There have been reports of the machine breaking down after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: because otherwise we really like the vacuum
customer_reviews.text: After 2 1/2 months of use, the two plastic clips that hold the plastic handle to the metal telescoping tube broke off. The clips are the only thing holding the handle to the unit and are not nearly strong enough for the job. I expect I'll get a replacement from Bissel, but I don't expect it to last much longer than the first one. It's really a shame, because otherwise we really like the vacuum. The red felt strip next to the brush roller is also coming off already.
customer_reviews.author: kurt schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: My Bissell and I were very best friends. I've had my vacuum since February, 2017. One day it just would not turn on. I read the guide. I read all the other reviews that were negative and the same thing seems to have happened to all of us. I read all the instructions and followed them all. I also read all the other reviews and tried all the tips and remedies and no luck. It just quit turning on. The lights come on but nothing else. I noticed that your customer service offers to help. Maybe you can also help me. I purchased the warranty and am not through the first year yet.
customer_reviews.author: J Mars

customer_reviews.title: lasted 14 months, used once a week
customer_reviews.text: I owned the Bissell Air Ram 14 months (using it once a week) before it went dead-- failed to turn on after full charge. I junked it and never liked it much when it was functioning for several reasons: it is noisy, debris gets wrapped around the spinning floor pickup roller, making frequent cleaning necessary; the cleaning mechanism is ok, but getting the canister back into the machine needs two hands.
customer_reviews.author: Montcalm

customer_reviews.title: Major design flaw - handle break easily
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum - if you don't mind paying $30 every few months to replace the handle. We've replace the upped handle twice in the 18 months that we've had the vacuum. The two parts of the upper handle are held together by two very flimsy plastic buttons. Doesn't take much to break them. Catch the machine on the leg of a bed, send Bissell $30. Huge design flaw in an otherwise very good vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: Norm

customer_reviews.title: Too bad there is not a zero star catagory
customer_reviews.text: This vacuum just stopped working after 5 months, the battery indicates charged, but nothing happens when you turn it on. After this happened I read the negative reviews and yep, same thing happened to me. If this cost $49 I might not be so upset, but really this is $200 vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: P Max

customer_reviews.title: Fast, quit and efficient.
customer_reviews.text: The Bissell is the best carpet sweeper ever made. It is an old fashion carpet sweeper, modernized given suction, and put on Steroids. I keep mine just off the kitchen in the pantry and i use it to pick up everything that falls or drops on the floor. Even my old great aunt who had too much to drink and fell asleep on the floor. Just kidding..
customer_reviews.author: Robert Caputo

customer_reviews.title: Going to call Bissel t see if they can send me one
customer_reviews.text: I have had it for less than a month and the telescopic handle came off
customer_reviews.author: M. Fleming

customer_reviews.title: NEVER WORKED AFTER ONE USE—— THAT ONE USE IT WAS AN AMAZING VACUM— BISSELL  REFUSED RETURN—VERY SAD
customer_reviews.text: I paid a premium price expecting a premium product and a brand “Bissell” that would honor and back up their product. I used it ONCE... Must admit it was the most amazing vacum I have ever had pulled hair from carpet strongly. AFTER ONE USE IT NEVER WORKED AGAIN AND AMAZON AND PRODUCT SUPPORT AT BISSELL TOLD ME TOUGH LUCK OUT OF SEND BACK PERIOD. OUT. $170. MADE IN CHINA— VERY VERY SAD. AND UNREAL THEY TREAT ME THIS WAY..... TOLD THEM. I WOULD PAY SHIPPING TO SEND BACK TO THEM AND PAY SHIPPING FOR UNIT THAT WORKS. BASICALLY THEY TOLD ME TO POUND SAND AND CLIMB A TREE.... VERY SAD .
customer_reviews.author: Todd H.

customer_reviews.title: Buy an extra filter ($9) to use as alternate...filters take a day or more to dry after cleaning.
customer_reviews.text: Really like this machine —Great design, great suction performance and battery duration, a pleasure to use, lightweight. I still recommend it even though after 6 months the handle broke as described in other reviews here but Bissell sent a free replacement under warranty. ($29.00 ++ otherwise). Filter wore out after 8 months...($9 part). Bissell customer service very accommodating.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Belle

customer_reviews.title: poorly made handle, never could get it to work
customer_reviews.text: I assembled this exactly as shown in the instructions. The upper handle was inserted into the lower handle exactly as described, but was subsequently not able to be popped back up into place in the extended position, despite pressing the side button and following instructions. Maddening. Handle would not go up or down, and was stuck for good. No way to fix it. Will be returning it without ever being able to use it, not even once. Wish I had not purchased it.
customer_reviews.author: Sally K; Rigler

customer_reviews.title: For me it's Only So-so.  YMMV.
customer_reviews.text: Despite a Consumer Reports positive rating I find it noisy, cumbersome, and slow in recharging (5 hrs); BUT most importantly it'll only pickup dirt on the forward push cycle. Don't drag it backwards over floor crud as it'll only pile up and be left behind when returning to a forward stroke. I've managed to work around that by always vac'g in a forward motion. In fairness, it's a quick touch up vac, easier than dragging a full vac out and getting to work. EDIT: at just over 2 years it died, with no warning. That's OK because I never warmed up to it. Expecting a new Dyson 11 in todays mail.
customer_reviews.author: Fox

customer_reviews.title: Loved it at first, did not hold up.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the convenience of this vacuum and how it moves under the furniture. Easy to empty. Also the light does a good job of highlighting dust and such, and it does a good job on both carpet and hardwood. It did not clean the hardwood well when it was also half on the carpet- the floor needs to be even to clean. However, the handle broke within a few months and we had to duct tape it so now it won’t go down. Now, after 1.5 years, the battery dies within 5-10 minutes. I wouldn’t buy this vacuum again and am disappointed in Bissell!
customer_reviews.author: Clairex

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum BUT useless on shag rugs
customer_reviews.text: Pro's: Lightweight, cordless, can clean underneath my bed easily, great maneuverability, fairly quiet Con's: I bought this vacuum because it is supposed to work on hard floors AND carpets. Works great on my hard floors as well as my flat carpets, but does NOT work on my shag area rug at all. On shag it freezes up and shuts down. Directions say to remove beater bar if this happens. I did. It did not freeze up, but it did not pick up anything off the carpet. It's useless on shag carpets.
customer_reviews.author: Sue L Neale-May

customer_reviews.title: Big Power in a Small Package
customer_reviews.text: I have to review this right out of the package for two reasons. First, I needed to do a bit of quick cleaning after Christmas visitors, so it was a wonderful surprise to find the battery charged enough for a quick cleanup. I got four bins of dog hair and miscellaneous debris before the battery fizzled out. (I don’t know yet how long a full charge will last.) Second, the vacuum suction feels comparable to our huge and heavy old Hoover upright. This Bissell replaces a my first cordless stick vacuum, a little Shark Navigator. I had no idea there was so much difference! Thanks to Consumer Reports for alerting me to the Bissell!
customer_reviews.author: K. Pirnie

customer_reviews.title: If it is not in the perfect position when you park it it falls over and ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a really cheap product. If it is not in the perfect position when you park it it falls over and you may be able to reattach the handle this happenened to me twice this week and the second attempt broke the "male" piece. Spend your money somewhere else rod broke off with little coercion to re attach. Hello landfill
customer_reviews.author: MaggieL

customer_reviews.title: Like the vacuum, but it's been over 4 months since released and no spare parts are available. Seriously!?
customer_reviews.text: The very fragile filter ripped, and I called Bissell to order a replacement filter. I bought the vacuum 4 months ago, and they said no spare filters will be available to purchase for at least another month. Seriously?!? How can you come out with a new vacuum and not have any spare parts available 4 months after release, especially given how fragile the filter is?? Not happy at all.
customer_reviews.author: A. Adler

customer_reviews.title: Died after a year
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a gift for my daughter last May and she just informed me that it died. At the time I purchased it it cost 187.00 you would expect a vacuum in this price range to last much more than a year.
customer_reviews.author: Paula

customer_reviews.title: Quit working
customer_reviews.text: Purchased specifically to vacuum tile and carpet floors behind two long haired cats. Does a great job. Picks up litter well too. Easy to empty waste. Battery lasts long enough to vacuum 1700 Sq ft. Initially very satisfied. But then after 9 months it quit working. This vacuum saw only light duty. Abut 3 times a week for 10 minured per use.. Battery shows charged. The vacuum starts but shuts down when moved.
customer_reviews.author: MARK

customer_reviews.title: Bad Customer service
customer_reviews.text: The vacuum worked fine for a couple of months but failed completely after a year. Warranty was for 2 years so when I called Bissell I was told they would ship me the foot assembly. I waited over a month, did not receive it and called again after weeks and was told by Bissell that the first rep who took my call never processed the order so it was never shipped out. Bad customer service at Bissell. Also Product should not have failed as it was only used to vacuum carpets with no pets and no kids and only 2 people in home with new carpets!
customer_reviews.author: VB

customer_reviews.title: Was great until it broke after 2 months
customer_reviews.text: This thing kicked major but for six weeks! And then it crapped out. The main gears grinded down and would not spin the brush. Nothing in there. I am mechanical and got inside. Thing is just cheaply assembled. I will get a new one-assuming it's under warranty. It should never come to that.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Giller

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I love the maneuverability of the unit and the mid-handle carrying loop is genius. However, after several uses, two recharges and five emptying, the battery would not release. I went to pull battery to recharge and set aside so as to not store the battery in the unit while away. Battery would not release from unit. When I return in a few months I will be returning the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Carlee W.

customer_reviews.title: Best cordless sweeper ive ever owned.
customer_reviews.text: I rarely do reviews. I am an extremely clean person i vaccum several times per week. I am very picky with vaccums. I own a 2,500 rainbow vaccum so i know vaccums. The suction and power of this cordless vaccum is unlike any other i have ever owned. I am a huge fan of Hoover..I bought a hoover air cordless vaccum for 250.00. I returned it the same day i got it. I was so dissapointed in Hoover. This vaccum is by far the best cordless sweeper on the market.
customer_reviews.author: Jamey Machmueller

customer_reviews.title: good battery life
customer_reviews.text: I researched this product and it was as expected. Pros: Cost, strong vacuum for cordless, good battery life, easy to use, easy to clean. Cons: Quality is questionable, light gauge plastic. Had it for 6 months no problem yet. No storage place for plug that fills beater hole, I had to drill hole in side of handle tube to store plug when not in use, easy fix but design flaw.
customer_reviews.author: Onyasix

customer_reviews.title: This Cordless Vacuum is the Nuts!
customer_reviews.text: We have had this vacuum now for about 3 years. I have never replaced the filter and still picks up pet hair great. The only problem I had with the vacuum is that I had to replace the battery shortly after getting it. However it has been flawless since. It stands upright and we leave it in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: E. Earnhart

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with this purchase for about 4-5 months, in fact, I was in love with this vacuum, but after 6 months it completely fell apart.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Danielian

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing, great while the battery lasted
customer_reviews.text: We bought this less than a year ago as a quick vacuum when we didn't want to get out the larger plug-in vacuum and were impressed: good suction, light weight, easy emptying. It was used once a week for a few minutes at a time, rarely enough to fully drain the battery. But within a few months the battery held less of a charge and took longer to recharge until this week, 10 months in, it fails to charge at all. Contacting the manufacturer and will update.
customer_reviews.author: Ross Lonstein

customer_reviews.title: Handle coming off
customer_reviews.text: I had it for two years now could be a little bit more suction but overall it works pretty well the handle kept on coming off there is a plastic tab that holds it together but finally broke after two years I put a Bolt into it It won’t come apart now
customer_reviews.author: Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, see update
customer_reviews.text: We had to remove the rotating brush to protect our wood floors, which means we cannot go from hard floors to carpets. Also, it does not pick up the tiny rocks our dog drags into the house. Update March 2018: Putting the brush back on made this machine my best friend. It does pick up all the tiny rocks now. Unfortunately, the thing just died on us one day for no reason. We'd had it for les than a year. Called Bissel and they sent us a replacement and all is good again. Trying to be more gentle with the new one.
customer_reviews.author: MrMcLarge

customer_reviews.title: Love this vacuum.  Ligthweight, best suction of any rechargeable I've used (which is a lot).
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. Lightweight, best suction I've ever experienced in a rechargeable vacuum. Descent size dust receptacle that's a little odd but fine. Yes, it's mostly plastic but that's how you get so little weight. I've been using it a lot and haven't had anything break or seem on the verge of breaking. The battery starting at full charge vacuums my whole house - floors and carpet, 2000 SF - and only uses about 25% of the charge. I'm so glad I bought it.
customer_reviews.author: T. Walsh

customer_reviews.title: light weight and cordless.
customer_reviews.text: I just got it today. I have had every kind of vacuum imaginable..... yes a Dyson too (sent it back). Those that have the weight on the handle, stick ones, are not for me. I want the weight on the floor and easy to use, cordless, wheels self-propelled, Goes under furniture. Why didn't I get this before? It is so easy, I have nothing to say bad about this product. Makes me want to clean house. Love love love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Battery dies within a few months of light use. You cannot order a battery on Amazon and the Bissell company was impossible to work with and would not replace it.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Best cordless vacuum EVER!!
customer_reviews.text: I have had countless cordless vacuums and this one is the best by far. Long long long life battery, excellent suction, and easy clean out. Every other cordless vacuum I've had falls over in the closet because all the weight is on the top. This does not fall over and stands upright perfectly while sitting in the closet. The clean out is a breeze and very effective. There is a carrying handle on the side which makes it easy carry up and down the stairs. Excellent suction on carpets and hardwood floors. Goes almost flat so you can vacuum under the couch. I would give this vacuum 10 stars if I could!!!
customer_reviews.author: D. Schulz

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum but leaves black marks if you get too close...
customer_reviews.text: We had this vacuum when Gtech made it and it was A+ fabulous! Since Bissell purchased it, it is still very good. The only thing we don’t like about it is that it leaves black marks on our white baseboards and white bathtub if you get too close. It is VERY hard to get off. I try to stay further away, but it would be nice if they would modify whatever they are using that leaves these black marks. Otherwise, it’s a great vacuum. We bought one for my son and for my mother to use and they love it as well (and yes, they have the black mark issue as well).
customer_reviews.author: Cobra

customer_reviews.title: Functions as described.
customer_reviews.text: Have been very satisfied with this unit's performance, both on carpeting and bare floors. Has very good suction. The nicest factor is how convenient it is, just unplug its battery cord and go. Has adequate power reserve to pretty much vacuum the entire 2,300 sq. ft. of living space in our home. Also, quick and easier to empty the dirt and you don't have to mess with bags.
customer_reviews.author: EverEddie

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made, died on the charger
customer_reviews.text: This piece of junk died on the charger less than a year into ownership. It had been barely been used, 1-2 hours at most. The battery still shows good but it won't power on. It worked pretty good when I was able to use it, but $100/hr is not a good cost of ownership.
customer_reviews.author: RoamingBison

customer_reviews.title: All the power you need
customer_reviews.text: Powerful little vacuum! Having used this at the design shop where I work, I knew it’s capabilities. Thinking I needed something more than this 2 years ago, I bought a different non chargeable brand. This Bessel is all I need! Be careful though, it can suck up cords in a nano second!
customer_reviews.author: JT

customer_reviews.title: Don't purchase, battery problems
customer_reviews.text: The battery pack for this product has failed two times in the last 18 months. I would not recommend buying this product.
customer_reviews.author: Papa3900

customer_reviews.title: The very best
customer_reviews.text: If you want deep cleaning, then you had better get the heavy, where is the plug, vacuum. It makes vacuuming so easy, that you do it daily. Because of that, you don't need the deep cleaning that often. I would never give this vacuum up without a fight, in fact, I bought one for my daughter and a back up for myself. You do not need to find plugs, the battery lasts very long, easy to clean, and suction is great. I have two Golden Retrievers and it makes cleaning floors an easier chore. I even vacuum their beds daily.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Brown

customer_reviews.title: BUMMER of a machine!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am giving this vacuum three stars because I actually really like it. It is lightweight and does the job. Sadly after a month of reasonable use it is falling apart - the handle broke today. So I am returning it and buying a Dyson. I am so bummed because I did my research and even read Consumer Reports. We need a reliable machine and while the AirRam works great, I can't buy another to have it fall apart again.
customer_reviews.author: Marshmallow Pie

customer_reviews.title: Seems flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I just received and unboxed this. It seems very flimsy and cheaply made, especially considering the price which is rather expensive. I purchased it on the recommendation of a consumer magazine. I only hope I didn't make a mistake by doing so. Only time will tell but I'm not getting my hopes up.
customer_reviews.author: GradyGuy

customer_reviews.title: Battery failed early, support good
customer_reviews.text: Battery failed after a few uses over three months. Email support sent a warranty replacement right away. The problem manifested as an error code after plugging in charger, code is: one green light for a few seconds and then four green lights. Support article says this means battery must be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Radovan

customer_reviews.title: So far satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I got the Bissel to replace a Gtech unit that stopped working. It does a good job of vacuuming the entire house and with less noise than the Gtech. Emptying the dirt is a bit more complicated. Overall I am satisfied with the purchase. Hope it lasts longer than the Gtech which stopped working 6 months after the warranty expired.
customer_reviews.author: wizardsonly

customer_reviews.title: Batteries Fail Completely
customer_reviews.text: with one major flaw this is hands down the best cordless vacuum I have owned or seen. I have owned it about a year and two batteries have failed. I was informed by factory service that the batteries are not covered by the warranty. Both batteries failed completely so the machine will not start. great machine but not practical to have to spend $60 twice in a year for upkeep.
customer_reviews.author: LeRoy M.

customer_reviews.title: Worked well until battery failed after about 6 total hours use.
customer_reviews.text: This unit did a good job of quick clean-ups. It's light and convenient. I used it for 10 or 15 minutes a couple times a month, so roughly 25 times for a total of about 6 hours in the course of a year. The battery lasted a good amount of time on each charge and recharged fairly quickly. Then, after using the unit to do a quick job I plugged the battery in to recharge. I left it plugged in for a few days, and the battery indicated it was fully charged, but when reinstalled on the vacuum it would not work at all.
customer_reviews.author: KeithM

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Not very good quality. Liked the convenience of a cordless but didn't hold up well. Within the first couple of months the handle broke. By the end of the first year the on off switch didn't work. Glad I bought an extended warranty on this product. Poor quality for the money
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Petzold

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement for a different cordless vacuum that had attachments and still use that one in the garage. This one (Bissell Air Ram Cordless Vacuum, 1984, Green) is great. Very strong suction and best of all, the dust bin is so easy to empty out. It is used everyday (2 dogs) even with a robot vacuum.If there is any complaint at all it would be the location of the charging port which is down by the head so a little inconvenient. Not enough though to take a star off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Wayne P.

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with this. We have central vac but it is used once every two weeks when we have a cleaning service . For daily or occasional pickups and light cleaning I have been using an inexpensive Electrolux which had marginal power and were messy to empty. It lasted a few years but finally died. I decided to try a more powerful unit. I certainly was not going to spring for the Dyson so I bought the Bissel 1984 Air Ram. It has a powerful suction and is easy to use and to clean. A great addition to our household.
customer_reviews.author: Malpractice

customer_reviews.title: Best battery operated vacuum I've found
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life. Easy to view battery status. (Lithium batteries should never be left charging once fully charged - it wears them out very quickly - but including an automatic shutoff on the charging function costs more.) That said, I really like this vaccum cleaner. We take it to my mother-in-law's place when we visit because it's light, powerful, maneuverable, holds a good charge, and it's easy to clean. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: LimaBN

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vacuum for keeping up with pets and kids
customer_reviews.text: I've tried a number of smaller vacuums and this is the first one that works on all surfaces and gets things clean. The battery life is great. It's not going to deep clean your carpets, but it will grab pet hair and surface clean. It works great on my stairs and couches. I'm about to buy my second one for our rental property.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Knoble

customer_reviews.title: Best small vacuum - and we have bought many over the past few months
customer_reviews.text: Needed a small lightweight vacuum to handle cat hair (we have 3) and clean the main floor of our home. (We have a giant heavy Kirby and it is just too much). This is the best vacuum. We have bought over 5 vacuums and this one is the best. Would buy again in a heartbeat.
customer_reviews.author: slsrb

customer_reviews.title: Makes Vacuuming Fun
customer_reviews.text: Good battery life and very easy to maneuver around. The adjustable handle is also very handy as our 4 year old daughter likes to help and we can adjust it all the way down to size. Also very much appreciate how easy it is to empty the dust bin container without having to touch/grab all of the debris. We used to rely a lot on our roomba, but this is just so easy to pull out and run, we actually don't use it anymore. FYI - I've only really used this on hardwood so can't speak to different surfaces.
customer_reviews.author: Brian W Streich

customer_reviews.title: Great sweeper!
customer_reviews.text: I have a 200 year old house with wooden floors and 2 large dogs that shed. This is the best sweeper I've ever used! It not only picks up dirt and dog hair but the dust on my floors that comes from owning an old house!!! I've never had a sweeper that picks up dust!! I can also use it on my area rugs and it picks up EVERYTHING! I have a Bissel Pro Pet too. It works great also, but this is so light and no cord hassle...makes my cleaning life sooo much easier!
customer_reviews.author: bekind

customer_reviews.title: Light and Easy to Use
customer_reviews.text: I first saw the Air Ram in the UK, and wanted one immediately. It is light in weight and very effective in cleaning. It won't replace a regular vac, but it is something you rely upon to do quick, effective cleaning. It also collapses in size, which makes it easy to store. It's also fun to use!
customer_reviews.author: David V

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Sure it is a great vaccum and was happy y9 biy it but while I bought a new one I received a used one with missing part. Not happy and returning as it is unseable. Dissapointed
customer_reviews.author: a customer

customer_reviews.title: I would have given this twenty stars if possible!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best cordless vacuum I have ever owned. I has great suction, holds the charge for a good length of time and the best it has a very bright light so you can see where the dust and dirt is. It stores away with the handle down into a convenient corner. The dirt trap is easy to empty and clean. I can't think of another feature needed in a cordless vacuum, I love this little machine.
customer_reviews.author: NoFigram

customer_reviews.title: Waste of Money
customer_reviews.text: When I first got this cordless vacuum it worked great but within a month it became louder and louder each time I used it. Then it started shut off after a minute or two even with a full battery charge. I called Bissell and they sent a replacement the battery. It did not solve the problem and now I'm so frustrated I have given up and have bought a different brand and have throw this Bissell out, what a waste of money, don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Teresa D.

customer_reviews.title: Great vacuum - somewhere between a quick sweeper and a ...
customer_reviews.text: Great vacuum - somewhere between a quick sweeper and a full vacuum, in my opinion. It's not quiet, a little heavy, and a bit large for a stick vacuum, but the battery life is GREAT and it cleans up a hard surface floor very well. I'd give it five stars for performance, five stars for battery, four stars for size, four stars for design. Update - Ordered this a year ago and it's still going strong. No noticeable decline in performance or battery life. I've gotten used to the weight and noise and don't notice it anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: the Cordless Vacuum worked great for a while
customer_reviews.text: As some other customers noted....the Cordless Vacuum worked great for a while, then after a few months stopped working even though battery light indicates it is fully charged and all trouble shooting recommendations completed. It does not seem worth it to try and get a replacement, send previously bought one back, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen L. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: I love this vacuum. I have had several cordless vacuums and this is by far the best. The suction is great, it handles easily, the container hold a lot of dirt and empties easily. I also like that it doesn't have to be mounted into a charging base, but just plugs in. The weight is at the bottom, so it doesn't tip over when I let go of it. I have wood and file floors, so I can't speak to how it works on carpet.
customer_reviews.author: Janet/ Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: take the chance.. you wont regret it
customer_reviews.text: one of the best purchases ive made in a long time. I had never heard of this unit until i just stumbled upon it here, and having watched and read all the online reviews i was still very cynical that it would be a worthy replacement for my dyson. I find myself vacuuming way more with this unit since its so light and ergonomic. I am shocked how much it picks up, both heavy dirt and the deep fine powdery kind of dust. I just keep vacuuming and vacuuming and it just continues to astound me. I just love this machine
customer_reviews.author: John S Fazackerley

customer_reviews.title: So glad I purchased this
customer_reviews.text: Consumer Reports highly recommended this vacuum for both carpet and hard surface flooring and was good for pet hair. It lives up to these recommendations. It is light weight and a joy to vacuum. I dreaded my older upright because it was so heavy and this one is very easy to take upstairs. I wanted a central vacuum system but this vacuum has exceeded my expectations so I've lost interest in the central vacuum system.
customer_reviews.author: Jan M DeGroat

customer_reviews.title: Love, Love, Love this vacuum.
customer_reviews.text: Light weight, works on my hardwood, tile, and carpet equally well. I use it several times a day. the battery lasts for 30-40 mins at full power and I love the headlight. Easy to empty and clean brush. Hard to think I could ask more out of a cordless vacuum. Had the Dyson first, the Bissell beats it hands down. Had it for over a year, not one problem.
customer_reviews.author: sherri

customer_reviews.title: It was exactly what I needed - but unfortunately not well built.
customer_reviews.text: I used it exactly 3 times and it quit working. I thought it was a battery problem so I purchased a new battery. Unfortunately it was some other problem. Eventually I got it working but I wish they would improve the quality - even if it means raising the price - because it's got some big advantages: light weight, battery can be taken out and charged elsewhere, easy to dump the trash, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Whitley

customer_reviews.title: Six stars!
customer_reviews.text: I'd give it 6 stars if possible. This is an outstanding device that performs as expected. I bought it based solely on a recent Consumer Reports article touting it as the best of its type.
customer_reviews.author: Richard from Roswell

customer_reviews.title: Cordless, lightweight vacuum
customer_reviews.text: If I could give this unit a 10, I would. This product is so easy to install, use and store. It took between 5 and 10 minutes to put the pieces together. It is lightweight, goes under furniture and is very easy to recharge. One of the best features is that it is cordless! There is a light on the front of the unit for ease of vacuuming. It comes partially charged. The full charging time was between 3-4 hours. I highly recommend this product. No, I have not been paid for this endorsement.
customer_reviews.author: Judems

customer_reviews.title: First time I turned it on the noise was terrible. I returned it the next day
customer_reviews.text: CR rated this as very quite. It is not. First time I turned it on the noise was terrible. I returned it the next day.. If you want a quite vacuum, do not buy this.
customer_reviews.author: Gerald P Rogers

customer_reviews.title: BEST VAC EVER
customer_reviews.text: I initially gave this product a bad review since a battery went out after only a few months. However, it was under warranty and customer service replaced the battery quickly and pleasantly. I really like this Vac. I have now purchased several for myself and as gifts because it is so good. I no longer use anything else. IT'S GREAT!! We can vacuum the entire house and still have plenty of battery left. I picks up better than much more expensive vacs I've had. It is very flexible and get in hard to reach places. WE LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Perry

customer_reviews.title: This is perfect, for me!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure how good it would be for deep cleaning carpet, but for my needs it is absolutely perfect! Picks up sand and other small debris, charge lasts thru 870 sq ft area, with lots of stuff to maneuver around. Swivel head makes vacuuming around furniture quick and easy, lays down low enough to get under chairs and side tables.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberley A

customer_reviews.title: Very loud on hard floors but decent choice
customer_reviews.text: It’s a decent vacuum but could use more suction. Beware, extremely loud on hardwood / vinyl floors. The turn radius is incredible but doesn’t work well going under beds or low lying furniture. Battery is ok.
customer_reviews.author: JD

customer_reviews.title: Handle broke not enough suction
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed. I bought this last January. I liked that it was lightweight and the charge lasted a long time. The handle broke already and it cannot be fixed. It also does not have much suction power and it has reduced over the past year. It is better for floors than carpets. We have already bought another vacuum to replace this one.
customer_reviews.author: Franticfran

customer_reviews.title: I love this vacuum!
customer_reviews.text: I did a ton of research before ultimately purchasing this vacuum. I wanted a cordless that was versatile enough to work on both carpets and hardwood floors, and this vacuum fit the bill perfectly. Not only that, but the battery life is impressive. It easily lasts at least 40 minutes per charge. Additionally, the battery is removable and replaceable, so you don’t have to replace the whole unit if the battery happens to fail. I also love the fact that there are no messy hoses that inevitably get clogged up. This vacuum is light and very easy to empty. I would HIGHLY recommend this vacuum.
customer_reviews.author: StacyP

customer_reviews.title: Waist of money.
customer_reviews.text: It had great reviews but that's about it. It worked great the first couple of times I used it, but now it continually shuts off on its own even though the battery is fully charged and nothing is impeding the roller brush. Very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Larry R. Marks

customer_reviews.title: wow one of the best
customer_reviews.text: Had to buy a new brush for it, I have three Pomeranians and that fine hair makes for high maintenance on everything. Now just regular maintenance keeps it running smooth. GREAT SERVICE DEPT also. I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: wayne t saile

customer_reviews.title: Vacuums well but poor handle construction
customer_reviews.text: It worked amazingly well for three weeks, and then the upper part of the handle broke off. Another reviewer had the same thing happen. The little plastic tabs that retain the handle broke off during normal use. Too bad, highly rated by CR, works well initially, but due to this defect I would advise trying another product. I note the other handle failure review was January of 2017, perhaps this is a new issue?
customer_reviews.author: TDH

customer_reviews.title: but was reluctant to remove the old one since I had used scotch tape to repair it and that worked fine. But now after 10 months the battery is ...
customer_reviews.text: Six months into use the handle broke off. I ordered a new handle, but was reluctant to remove the old one since I had used scotch tape to repair it and that worked fine. But now after 10 months the battery is running out and I can no longer vacuum my whole small house at one time. I have ordered a new battery but was shocked to learn that batteries cost $50 apiece. You might bear that in mind. That said, this is the most delightful vacuum I have ever used for ease of use. It gets into all the corners and under the furniture very easily. I just wish it didn't have these unpleasant surprises.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor battery life.
customer_reviews.text: Had this product for a little over a year, then the battery stopped working. Worked fine until then.
customer_reviews.author: C T Rubio

customer_reviews.title: Bought a Second Air Ram When the Dyson Broke
customer_reviews.text: I have an identical one that has worked well for a few years and still works like new, so I bought another when my big Dyson broke after 3 years and the handle on my stick Dyson broke within a few months. I keep small scissors to snip the long hair off the brush. Easy to clean, easy to wash. I do wish it was HEPA filtered.
customer_reviews.author: J. O.

customer_reviews.title: Love this! Bad back--Newfoundland dogs... many vacuums...
customer_reviews.text: I could not love this more--it does what it needs to do, it is incredibly easy to empty the junk holder--and you can see when it's full. Just great! My only issue is that it doesn't have the little separating hand-vac, and therefor you can't get into tiny corners with it. But my back is wretched and I have long-haired double-coated giant dogs, yes I do! love them! Anyway, this little guy gets most of the dirt, and most of the hair. More than good enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Very handy
customer_reviews.text: Works like a regular vacuum. I like that when not using the vac it's it will stand on it's own without having to lean on a wall or counter, or hang on a hook. Picks up dust well, just ok on tight corners,
customer_reviews.author: jake

customer_reviews.title: lightweight with great suction
customer_reviews.text: I purchased it to use for quick clean up of pet hair between regular vacuumings. With two dogs I was having to sweep the hardwood floors daily which was time consuming and not very effective. The Bissell makes clean up fast and easy on the bare floors. It's great on pet hair and does a good job on edges and under furniture. I think it actually does a better job on the carpeted areas than my upright but it is more difficult to push over the carpet than the upright. So far it has met all my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela A. Richardson

customer_reviews.title: hunk of junk
customer_reviews.text: The power button stopped working after about maybe 10 uses over the course of 2 years. There are no repair options, but Bissell offered me 20% off the latest model. Why on earth would I buy another Bissell if they don't stand by their product?
customer_reviews.author: Kira O

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I only had this vacuum for six weeks. So far it is excellent in every way. The battery lasts a long time before recharging is needed. The vacuum is lightweight, easy to handle and powerful. I have read that some people have had trouble with the handle breaking. So far I have not had any problems.
customer_reviews.author: ray m

customer_reviews.title: It's not a kirby but it IS cordless!!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a robust and heavy quality vaccum this isnt for you. The battery is powerful but the vaccum is Not adjustable so heads up! The brush is basic and not the pet brush. Since my house is small I'm mostly satisfied untill it breaks or the battery cramps out however making a non height adjusting vaccum that cost $250 dollars os retarded!
customer_reviews.author: Erik skonovd

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for the first month.
customer_reviews.text: It worked great for the first month then the battery starting dying quicker. The battery will drop to 3 bar then drop to one and then just shut. All within 10 minutes of using it. It works great on hardwoods. Not sure about carpet. I do use it on my low pile rug and works great on there too.
customer_reviews.author: M MCDONALD

customer_reviews.title: Best battery operated vacuum for the price IMHO
customer_reviews.text: This bad boy has as much suck as my my 11 hundred dollar Capricorn Miele canister. It picks up all those proto dust bunnies generated by my 2 dogs and one cat. Runs about 20 minutes on a battery - buy a second battery for backup and this is the best portable around (sorry Oreck) Rated #2 in Consumer reports for Battery operated vacuums, and 1/2 the price of #1 (Sorry Oreck)
customer_reviews.author: grumpyoldgeezer

customer_reviews.title: Works on bare floors and carpet but would be better if it could also get into corners or work ...
customer_reviews.text: Works on bare floors and carpet but would be better if it could also get into corners or work on stairs (hose or nozzle). Don't let it get too full before emptying as carpet fibers can get stuck behind the clean out arm. A second filter is a good idea as it takes a couple of days for the filter to completely dry out after washing. All is all OK but I'll likely look for some else.
customer_reviews.author: Zbluesman

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous and easy to clean
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my mother and she is thrilled. This is such a great vacuum and so easy to use. Love that it is cordless and that cleaning it is so easy. Also love that you can see the hair go into the machine while you are using it. I have a vacuum that doesn't do that and I keep forgetting to empty it.
customer_reviews.author: Brook S. Teal

customer_reviews.title: Powerful
customer_reviews.text: Bar none, one of the best purchases i’ve ever made. So light weight, so easy to pull out of the closet without having to mess with a long cord and the best part is that it is powerful!!! The handle can go all the way down so you can vacuum under the bed and other hard to reach areas. I LOVE it! It was also $75.00 cheaper on Amazon than on HSN.
customer_reviews.author: S. Casias

customer_reviews.title: Light weight and portable
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cordless vacuum. I can reach under our California King size bed without having to move it since the handle folds flat. The suction is good, but not as good as our noisy and heavy Hoover, however I would not trade in the cordless, light weight and portability features for the suction. We are happy with this purchase and have owned it for about 2 months. We hope it will not have the same issues that other customers have encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Nbg

customer_reviews.title: Vacuuming is faster than ever
customer_reviews.text: We love this vacuum, it does great on hardwood and carpet. Surprisingly easy to maneuver and lays flat to get under furniture. It’s so light we use it on carpeted steps with reasonable effectiveness although the attachments on a full-size vac might have slightly better coverage. Dumping the canister is fast & easy. We usually use it on two floors of our townhouse with plenty of charge left. Best part, vacuuming is faster than ever, no messing with cords and attachments on steps.
customer_reviews.author: Gene Glinecki

customer_reviews.title: Great Vacuum
customer_reviews.text: I am very impressed with this cordless vacuum - especially for the cost. I was going to get the Dyson but then saw this was rated better and I'm not disappointed. The battery DOES last a long time and it works well for floors and carpet. The filter is super easy to clean. The only downside I have found is that it doesn't pick up along edges very well.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin in Houston

customer_reviews.title: Battery is dead after 6 months?
customer_reviews.text: Bought one last November. Used only a couple of times. Now it’s not working. Does anyone know how do I return or get a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Better Than ANY Full-Service Vac!
customer_reviews.text: I'm totally amazed by how much "deep dirt" this cordless vacuum picks up. The charge is long-lasting. It is light and very easy to operate. And with the 2-size handles, even my toddler grandson, who is currently obsessed with vacuums, LOVES using this very safe appliance.
customer_reviews.author: Justice

customer_reviews.title: Excellent vacuum
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite vacuum for everyday messes and maintenance. It doesn't have the suction of a large or professional machine, but the cordless convenience makes up for it. I use this vacuum every single day, and get out my large water filter vacuum once a week for deep cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: J.W.

customer_reviews.title: We like it and our cleaning lady likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Living in a condo without a utility room this type of cordless vacuum seems to work best for us. The $500 Dyson cordless we replaced lasted only 3 yrs. - so far this seems to work better, can clean the whole 1300 sq ft without recharging which the Dyson never did. Hoping it has s longer life also.
customer_reviews.author: JaeMae

customer_reviews.title: Loud
customer_reviews.text: Has an annoying sound, but love the fact that you do not have a cord which is a plus for me. Make sure to keep the filter clean, if not it seems to not have as great of a suction. I use for ceramic floors as well as carpet. I have not had any trouble after regular use. If they could just make the vacuum quieter I would of given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Versatile, powerful suction, easy to operate.
customer_reviews.text: I can go from floors to area rugs, and without a cord to contend with, I finish my cleaning in half the time it took me with a corded vacuum. Great suction, and an easy to empty canister. Easy to recharge. Maneuvers around corners and angles nicely in tight quarters. Relatively quiet compared to other vacuums, but I would like an even quieter version.
customer_reviews.author: Karyn Osterman

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Wow! what can I say; this thing is amazing. LIGHTWEIGHT, EASY TO CLEAN, AND INCREDIBLY POWERFUL. I really do it love it and I'm considering buying the [really expensive] handheld model. Just a warning on this because it sucks so hard it's hard to push around. I wouldn't purchase this for your Grandma!
customer_reviews.author: An avid Amazon user

customer_reviews.title: We have dark hardwood throughout the house which makes it easy to see
customer_reviews.text: Very furry dog leaves dog hair everywhere. We have dark hardwood throughout the house which makes it easy to see. Needless to say we vacuum 4 to 5 times a day. This vacuum works very well on both the hardwoods and our area rugs. Its great not having to mess with cords and its weight - or lack of weight - makes it so easy to maneuver around.
customer_reviews.author: Kenz

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY PIECE OF JUNK
customer_reviews.text: So it was used 3 times and it stopped working...lights are all on fully charged but it will not turn on..... and Bissell says they will not replace it because we use it at work and not at home! SCAM DO NOT BUY BISSELL IS THE WORST!!!
customer_reviews.author: Angei

product_meta.title: Bissell Cordless Vacuum, 1984, Green Air Ram
product_meta.description: Meet the Lightweight & Powerful Air Ram Cordless Vacuum. Equipped with a 22V Lithium ion battery, this cordless vacuum delivers up to 40 minutes of powerful, fade free suction across carpets, hard floors, and area rugs. The Air Ram is ultra light and easy to use weighing less than 1 pound in use, and with swivel steering and a lay flat handle, it maneuvers under and around furniture with ease. Do not block the appliances openings or hinder air flow; keep openings free of any objects including dust, lint, clothing, fingers. Soft Bumper Yes
feature_bullets: Every Purchase Saves Pets. BISSELL proudly supports BISSELL Pet Foundation and its mission to help save homeless pets.
Lightweight & Compact. This cordless powerhouse weighs less than 8 pounds and has a collapsible handle for easy storage.
Powerful Multi-Surface Cleaning. Innovative power foot design and multi-surface brush roll delivers high performance cleaning on hard floors and carpets.
Cordless Cleaning Power. Removable Lithium-Ion battery provides 40 minutes of fade-free power and cordless convenience.
Maximized Maneuverability. Move under and around furniture easily with swivel steering and a lay flat handle.
Easy Empty Dirt Bin. Removable dirt bin with built-in Easy Empty slider pushes out debris, hair and dirt for a mess-free empty.
LED Lights. Bright, wide range LED lights illuminate fine dirt and debris on hard floors for effective cleaning.
AirRam is a trademark of Grey Technology Limited.

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item can be shipped to select countries outside of the U.S. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars1,243 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
